welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rossdorf, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Rossdorf has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a time limit of 4 hours per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Secondary terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Air Base Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
